body:
# **Korey Kam**
koreykam AT gmail DOT com




## Welcome to my homepage
Hi, I'm Korey Kam. Currently, I am a PhD student in the Department of Neuroscience at NYU (lab of Helen Scharfman). My interests lie in early Alzheimer's diagnosis, brain signals, and statistical graphics.


## Research
By studying patterns of abnormal brain activity during sleep in models of early Alzheimer's disease, we hope to one day prevent it.


## Publications
[GScholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=gCu1RP0AAAAJ&hl=en/)
